column5: AMRS Just some thoughts on overestimation and false projections from Melos point of view 1 There is no experience in these new business areas Your influence in the future will be unimaginably large in your opinion but you have no clues about the impact because there is no historical data 2 You do not have one but several products Sweetener CBD and know the production process down to the last detail but do not yet know any details from the path from production to market 3 You have no evidence no experience and no historical data from the market regarding the necessary formulation the development of the new markets as well as the upcoming regulations for the introduction
